website_summaries.verdict: Vibram FiveFingers created a winter version of the massively popular Trek Ascent line in the wool-insulated model. The more aggressive and ultra-sticky outsole makes running on icy and wet conditions a breeze. Provided that runners don’t run on puddles or tackle more than 1 inch of snow, their feet should feel the comforting warmth of the wool collar and sockliner. It delivers a rightful blend of the great traction and superior comfort that barefoot runners can hardly find in today’s market.
pros: Most of the reviewers exclaimed that the Vibram FiveFingers Trek Ascent Insulated is easily the most comfortable shoes they have ever worn in winter
The testers agreed that the wool-lined upper unit was able to provide warmth during the cold seasons
A large number of users considered the price as truly reasonable
The shoe is easy to wash, commented several runners
The outsole’s tread gained positive feedback for being efficient on dry and wet surfaces
Some runners have used it on the trail and on the road
There are enough ground feel and adequate protection, according to more than a handful of users
Several consumers lauded the lightweight nature of this running shoe
Runners observed that the Vibram FiveFingers Trek Ascent Insulated was flexible enough to accommodate natural foot-movement
cons: Some runners pointed that a heel loop would have made shoe entry and exit substantially easier
A few complaints were made about how difficult the shoe was to dry once it got wet
The water-resistant upper barely shielded the shoe from water, according to a handful of reviewers

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy bigger - buy your size!
customer_reviews.text: I order two of these, and following the advice from others on here, I bought half a size up, only to discover they were too long. Upon re-purchasing the correct size, everything fit as expected. As usual with Vibrams: they feel tight on until you've warn them a bit - I have really wide feet (and big toes), yet width of vibrams hasn't been an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. L. Le Brun

customer_reviews.title: The best Vibram five fingers ever !
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Vibram five fingers so I'm used to the feel and fit, these however did feel too tight and I did wonder if I needed a bigger size, however after my second day of wearing they are feeling much more comfortable now Update : Day 3, and they feel fine no longer tight and as comfortable as they should be, worries over *****
customer_reviews.author: Mikie

customer_reviews.title: Sizing differences....
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a UK size 10.5/11 EU size 46 (made in Vietnam) which are a little tight compared to my UK size 11/EU 45 (made in China) which are a little bit big. Other buyers throughout Amazon have mentioned sizing issues too and this may be due to the country of manufacturing, if so, then make sure you buy from the a country that suits your foot size. My third pair would be from China if at all possible.These are a great shoe if you have wide feet or suffer from inter digital blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Big Ideas, Little Enthusiasm

customer_reviews.title: Amazing as always !
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Shoes! This is my 4th pair of Fivefingers and an EL-X as my other 2 Leather Trek ascent and Ascent were finally put out of their misery after 2 and a half years of wear and tear! Which is pretty amazing seeing i use them for everything from day to day use (indoor and outdoor) in all weathers! These fit amazing and i intend to use these for mainly outdoor walking, hiking, running etc :)! Awesome brand defo recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Long

customer_reviews.title: Great but a little on the large size
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof. Ok for anything down to 5 degrees after that I began to feel the cold. I like these as the sole is slightly thicker than the others so insulates well, sole gives plenty of grip. I found a plus of these is that they don't make your feet look too small. They do come up on the large size to be honest, about one size bigger than I would normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Feel great on the mountain
customer_reviews.text: Feel great on the mountain, so nimble compared to hiking boots. Obviously you need to pick and choose where you use them as they aren't water proof. I'm a size 41. In five finger shoes I wear 40. However, with these a 41 seems perfect. Other reviewers suggested going a size up and I tend to agree for this model.
customer_reviews.author: Dai Watson

customer_reviews.title: The best barefoot shoes for when you need a little warmth
customer_reviews.text: Vibrams are a great investment. I find they last a long time, have great grip etc. These are quite specific as they are the thickest, warmest vibrams. They aren't very thick/warm compared to a regular pair of shoes, but it's not regular, it's barefoot. Just be careful not to get them too wet.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Karamian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for British winters.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, now my feet are happy AND warm. I had to go up a size - strange, when I'd expect Vibram to have accounted for the bulk of the insulation on the inside and alter the size classification accordingly. But one size up fits perfectly. Very comfy and warm and much more puddle-proof than any other Vibrams.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Literally sensational
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of five finger shoes but the first outdoor ones. Cycling, walking and running are new again and I have found lower limb muscles that I didn't know existed. I'm a UK size 10 and these 9.5/10 Vibrams were right at first but now they're fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mr T

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoe but they are a good size smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe but they are a good size smaller than advertised. This is a known issue and I expected it. My problem is that I am size 47 in five fingers and so I need a 48 in this model. I fixed this by using a wooden shoe-block to stretch the shoe for a few days, then after running in them a couple of times barefoot, they've stretched enough to wear with socks :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe fakes... defect for sure.
customer_reviews.text: The first pair i got was defect as the toe rubber and the sole was "cracked". Then i ask for replacement and receive the 2nd pair and the defect was more than the 1st pair ! All toe rubbers were not seamless with the sole. I ask directly from the Vibram customer service and the guy told me that it suppose to be seamless, not waterproof (which i knew) but seamless. Bottom line: they're defect for sure, maybe fakes... I send both pair back. Disappointing :(
customer_reviews.author: VRGB

customer_reviews.title: Can be used every day and look closer to normal shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Vibram Five Fingers for 10 + years rarely wearing 'normal' shoes. These are the best for everyday use with the most acceptable appearance, and the best for rainy days though not completely waterproof. As an aside I use Vibram Five Fingers even to play tennis and find the biggest benefit is to my knees, for reference I play singles and am over 80!
customer_reviews.author: J B.

customer_reviews.title: size 11 UK snug fit
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 11 and these are pretty snug. They are my second pair of Vibram five finger shoes and are more comfy than the last. I am sure they will be fine. But they could do with a little more space in the toes.
customer_reviews.author: chunk

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes that do keep your toes warm.... untill they get wet which unfortunatley still happens with these. Really wish they would bring out a waterproof model! Bring back Lontra!
customer_reviews.author: Mr H

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a snug fit for a size 10.5. When you order get half a size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Polyester

customer_reviews.title: Great walk
customer_reviews.text: Simply fantastic to walk in Vibrams. Although you look like an idiot when wearing them, the feeling is quite undescribable. Either you like it or not. But for naature lovers like myself this is the ideal item for wet and cold weather. They are really, really warm. Get some toe socks as well! I wear size 45 and bought 47 - fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Rubin Schwein

customer_reviews.title: Odd fit at first but getting better.  Not too warm so prob good all year.
customer_reviews.text: Little too big for my big toe bit tight between my little toe for first week or so. Have relaxed in recent days for my little toe. Coupled with sock fit is better. Overall happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They did tear. However this was because my foot was ran over by a London taxi driver.
customer_reviews.text: Best footwear I've ever worn. Cannot thing of being my next pair that aren't vibram five fingers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous seriously thinking of wearing them all the time
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these for running. Fit literally like a glove! Seriously considering gettingaanother pair and wearing them as my daily shoe.
customer_reviews.author: chris shaw

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I've previously had the bare minimal 5finger shoe in the past, they were at least 5 plus years old, so I had to get used to having the thicker sole and material. But they are very comfortable indeed. But I did need to go up half a size though with this particular design. I think it was due to the thickness of the fabric. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Bugaoan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all. Bit different to the unlined ones but fine once get used to it
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needs a loop on heel,hard to pull on without.wonder ful to wear,cosy and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: VAL

customer_reviews.title: Great brand of footwear
customer_reviews.text: As my second pair of vibram, they don't dissapoint. Great product highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: simon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fit with extra pading.
customer_reviews.text: My feet are 26 cm , and this 42 eu fits perfectly. You couldn’t wish for a better fit. Omg such a incredible feeling. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Vedran

customer_reviews.title: Feet love them.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, fit like a glove, though I had to stretch the wrinkles out of one big toe at first.
customer_reviews.author: MISS C M ABBOTT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and warm - ideal for the cooler weather
customer_reviews.author: sz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm for winter wear.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who is on his feet all day. He loved them, so comfortable and warm for winter wear.
customer_reviews.author: valerie gosling

customer_reviews.title: Buy one size up from your usual shoe size
customer_reviews.text: By far the best Vibram shoes in the range. Excellent comfort and grip.
customer_reviews.author: Mohsin Khoda

customer_reviews.title: First pair
customer_reviews.text: They are my first pair and they are so comfy
customer_reviews.author: moviemaster

customer_reviews.title: Dreadful.
customer_reviews.text: Was happy with them when they first arrived. They were very comfortable. Until the stitching around the tongue started to break. I messaged them and they repaired the shoe. I was happy until a month after the repair they have broke again. They are not very reliable and are not the sturdiest pair of shoes. When I messaged them again I received rude messages from them and do not recommend these to anyone. They are not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but when I got a size up like recommended they were way too big
customer_reviews.text: Hahaha Had to get 3 pairs to decide on the right size for me!;) so obviously it feels a bit different than other vibrams that i have. At first i thought I ordered a size too small, but when I got a size up like recommended they were way too big. I normally wear 8.5-9 and that is the size that fits me best. After a couple hours of wear they feel perfect! Everyone is different but mind that the larger the shoe the wider too, so for large skinny feet they might not fit as well. These are an awesome pair of shoes! Comfortable, keep my feet warm and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: martyna

customer_reviews.title: Dry(ish) feet for the first winter in three years.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of V5fs and for the first winter in a while I have warm and mainly dry feet. Fit is a little snug but the material does give a little after a few wears. Could do with a wider range for these warmer Vibrams.
customer_reviews.author: Paddymonster

customer_reviews.title: I fcuking love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I fcuking love these shoes!!!! I have several other fivetoe shoes but these are by far the most comfortable. I`ve not wanted to take them off since i`ve gotten them. I`m a size 8 and bought an 8-8.5 and with a pair off socks on too, they are very snug, not tight tho. The insulation is minimal and not really sufficient in winter but thats great as they`re wearable all the rest of the year round. I was more concerned about my feet getting too hot rather than cold, so all good. Easily the best shoes I`ve ever bought and will buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: dylan taylor

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size bigger than usual
customer_reviews.text: Love five fingers, have other pairs but different models, which I love. As they are all the same size and fit well I ordered the same size. I was disappointed to find the trek ascent almost too snug. I think the sole is the same size but there is so much extra material on the upper it actually shrinks the shoe size a little. For me it’s only a problem after an hour or so I can feel rubbing on my big toe where the seam sits. Otherwise a fab winter edition of my favourite shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Eilidh Shearer

product_meta.title: Vibram FiveFingers Men’s Trek Ascent Insulated Multisport Outdoor Shoes
product_meta.description: Ideal for cooler temperatures, the Trek Ascent Insulated is perfect for Battling the elements on cold weather adventures
feature_bullets: Machine or hand Washable on a cool wash and allow to Air Dry do not use direct heat sources to dry such as a hairdryer or radiator.
Material Composition: Polyester/Nylon Chemical Fabric/High Tenacity Nylon/Wool Blended Fabric
